ruling: - See [[Gladiator Beast Alexander]] for additional rulings.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Dimacari]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, it can attack twice during the Battle Phase. If [[Skill Drain]] is later activated, this effect is negated and [[Gladiator Beast Dimacari]] will no longer be able to attack twice with its effect. Even if [[Skill Drain]] is later negated or removed from the field, [[Gladiator Beast Dimacari]]'s effect to attack twice during the Battle Phase will not be reapplied.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Dimacari]] is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster and it is flipped face-down, when it is flipped face-up its effect to attack twice during the Battle Phase will not be applied.
